alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 01 at 6:10PM MST until July 01 at 7:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 715 PM MST. * At 610 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 6 miles east of Kings Ranch to near Seville to 6 miles southeast of Freeman, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 162 and 179. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 145 and 154. US Highway 60 between mile markers 178 and 219. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Apache Junction, Gold Canyon, Sun Lakes, East Mesa, Maricopa, Queen Creek, Gold Camp, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, San Tan Village Mall and San Tan Valley. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
